{{Tutorial

|about    = Jinni in the Magic Bottle — Liloupar
|image1   = Tutorial Jinni in the Magic Bottle Liloupar II 1.png
|text1    = Liloupar has regained a portion of her energy and can use limited amounts of her Jinni's Might to clear certain obstacles that block her master's way.
|image2   = Tutorial Jinni in the Magic Bottle Liloupar II 2.png
|text2    = By using her Jinni's Might, Liloupar can remove [[Small Atmospheric Vortex|small]] and [[large Atmospheric Vortex]]es. However, Liloupar will lose Jinni's Might when she encounters Wenut attacks.
|image3   = Tutorial Jinni in the Magic Bottle Liloupar II 3.png
|text3    = Various ancient ruins within the Desert of Hadramaveth have [[Jinn Shrine]]s in them. Draw near to the Jinn Branches within them to restore Jinni's Might for Liloupar.
